titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2014) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to subsections (b)(2) and (d) of section 105 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1998.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-221, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2014 with 2 hours and 30 minutes of general debate. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration shall be waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/31/1997--Passed House amended. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2014 (tax revisions).
